description: Complete 24-rune Elder Futhark set for aura reading integration

runes.name: Fehu
runes.lesson: Tend what you have and let it flow; invest energy where it grows
runes.warning: Clinging, greed, or chasing status over substance

runes.name: Uruz
runes.lesson: Channel power with purpose and discipline
runes.warning: Force without focus; burnout or stubbornness

runes.name: Thurisaz
runes.lesson: Pause at the gateway; act consciously and defend your boundaries

runes.name: Ansuz
runes.lesson: Listen deeply and speak truth with clarity

runes.name: Raidho
runes.lesson: Move in step with timing; align travel and choices to purpose
runes.warning: Forcing the pace; drifting without direction

runes.name: Kenaz
runes.lesson: Light the way with wisdom; teach and learn with passion
runes.warning: Arrogance, false knowledge, burning out others

runes.name: Gebo
runes.lesson: Give and receive in balance; honor sacred reciprocity

runes.name: Wunjo
runes.lesson: Celebrate what works; align with your true happiness
runes.warning: False joy, addiction to pleasure, avoiding shadow
